refnamediv.refpurpose: Compresses the current Phar entry with either zlib or bzip2 compression

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.errors;
Throws BadMethodCallException if the phar.readonly INI variable is on, or if the bzip2/zlib extension is not available.
